conversations.body_text: Any reply? Link are not working. William Dos Santos

HI,

Please cancel this order and proceed with refund. I haven’t got any replied in 7 days so I don’t need the items anymore

Thanks,

William

>
Hi William,    I'm sorry for not getting back to you sooner. I see your package has been delivered—did you receive it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2533700710339919

Hello,

No worries, Well received and installed.

Happy holiday season!

Kind regards,

William 

>
